sentences.english: Where is the ball?
The ball is on the rug.
Where is the cat?
The cat is in front of the window.
Where is the boy?

sentences.finnish: Poika on ovella ja tulossa huoneeseen.
sentences.english: The boy is at the door and coming into the room.
Where is the television?
The television is on the TV stand.
Where is grandfather?
Grandfather is sitting on the sofa.
Where is the coffee cup?
The coffee cup is on the table.
Where is the dog?
The dog is sleeping in the armchair.
Where is the baby?
The baby is playing on the rug.
Where is the shoe?
The shoe is in the room.
Where is the cat?
The cat is in the box.
Where is the camera?
The camera is on the bookshelf.
Where are the glasses?
The glasses are on the bookshelf.
Where is the radio?
The radio is on the shelf.
